body:
Thanks for the suggestion! 

Is tracing disabled on methods with `TensorOptions` argument? `.to(device)` now dispatches to `at::Tensor::to(TensorOptions)` and it seems to be traced as a no-op. I haven't looked at the JIT generated code, but will do tomorrow.
